lead_paragraph: GREENSPAN--Florence. With sadness, Mrs. Karen Zarembski of Baltimore, MD and Mr. Eric Greenspan of Brooklyn, NY announce the passing of their beloved mother, Mrs. Florence Greenspan. Florence Wolf was born on December 28, 1920. She later married Julius Greenspan and had two children, Eric and Karen. She also had six grandchildren, and nine great-grandchildren. Her children wish to remember her as a deeply loving mother and patriotic American who worked more than two decades with the Coast Guard. She was a lover of all things music -- whether it was taking her children to Broadway shows or jogging down Avenue J with her headphones on. The funeral is set to take place this Sunday, February 7th at the IJ Morris Funeral Home at 1895 Flatbush Ave., Brooklyn, NY 11210. 1/3
